entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1 except minus 3 over the Highlands. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing early this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1 except minus 3 over the Highlands. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
